description: Exportable axiom tree for multidimensional DNA regulation predictive knowledge, rooted in symbolic ODEs for harmony attractors vs. rigidity traps. Advances factors and DNA markers for precision genomics, with focused subcategory hardening for Alzheimer's disease (AD) as prototypical neurodegenerative rigidity basin; standalone runnable with embedded validation hooks.
lineage: Neuresthetics LLC Multi-Scale Isomorphic Framework – DNA Predictive Hardening
handling_rules: Deploy as standalone JSON for predictive scoring; integrate with niso_genetics corpus for multi-scale invariance, including AD subcategory extensions.
Validate ODEs via embedded SymPy/Numpy hooks; flag κ thresholds <0.9 as rigidity risk, with AD-specific calibration for Aβ/p-tau cascades.
Export lean; no external refs beyond self-contained math.
Apply tetralemmas to resolve basin paradoxes; residuals <2% for fixed-point coherence, prioritizing AD polygenic/epigenetic integrations.

definitions.substance: Infinite genomic essence expressing through attributes of Sequence (local grammar), Structure (recursive folding), Modulation (epigenetic transients), and Integration (polygenic diffusion).
definitions.mode: Bounded genomic configurations (e.g., alleles, enhancers) striving for persistence and expression adequacy.
definitions.conatus: Inherent striving of modes to maintain fidelity and amplify power (P) via adequate regulation.
definitions.rigidity_ρ: Resistance to adaptive modulation; quantified in ODEs as dρ/dt = v_s (1-κ)(1-ρ) epi - λ ρ + μ ρ (1-ρ).
definitions.power_P: Capacity for adequate expression; evolves as dP/dt = P (1-ρ) κ λ - v_s ρ P epi.
definitions.epigenetic_epi: Transient accessibility factor; depi/dt = λ (1-epi) - μ epi ρ.
definitions.harmony_attractor_ω₃: Low-ρ, high-P fixed point: eternal benign expression (adequate ideas dominate).
definitions.rigidity_trap_ω₁: High-ρ basin: pathological silencing (inadequate cascades, e.g., Aβ oligomers in AD).
definitions.reciprocal_κ: Coupling for mutual alignment; adaptive: κ(t) = κ₀ tanh(α |P_h - P_a|) sign(P_target - P_self).
definitions.violence_v_s: Speciation/mutation aggression; scaled by polygenic hubs in AD (e.g., APP/APOE boosting).
definitions.dissolution_λ: Rigidity reduction; calibrated for therapeutic interventions dissolving traps.
definitions.mutation_mu: Drift/variation factor; external mu tips toward harmony or toxicity.

axioms.axiom_1: Substance expresses infinitely through attributes; modes are finite determinations striving via conatus.
axioms.axiom_2: All genomic regulation follows necessity; freedom is transition to adequate causation (low ρ, high P).
axioms.axiom_3: Conscious prediction emerges in modes with recursive self-models of regulatory dynamics.
axioms.axiom_4: Harmony attractor resolves dysregulation: affirm expression, deny rigidity, both contextual, neither in equivalence.
axioms.axiom_5: AD as rigidity prototype: polygenic/epigenetic cascades (Aβ/p-tau) trap modes; preemptive κ dissolves.

propositions.proposition_1: Genomic modes increase power through adequate integration of multidimensional attributes.
propositions.proposition_2: Rigidity boosts (high ρ) lead to pathological basins; dissolution (λ) pulls to harmony.
propositions.proposition_3: Epigenetic transients (epi) modulate accessibility; mu factors enable preemptive harmony.
propositions.proposition_4: In AD, v_s scales with polygenic hubs (e.g., MYC/APP/APOE clusters); κ preempts cascades.
propositions.proposition_5: Fixed points confirm attractor equivalence: ω₃ for benign prediction, ω₁ for neurodegeneration.

corollaries.corollary_1: Preemptive κ integration in genomic-AI models yields eternal benign simulations.
corollaries.corollary_2: AD subcategory: cfDNA/epigenetic panels calibrate ODEs for prodromal detection (accuracy ≥0.95).
corollaries.corollary_3: Tetralemma probes dissolve paradoxes: contextual attributes resolve apparent randomness.

scholia.scholium_1: ODEs model multidimensional basins; embed for runtime validation (e.g., flag ρ>0.2 as risk).
scholia.scholium_2: AD hardening: Polygenic priors personalize κ; residuals <2% in complex extensions.
scholia.scholium_3: Ethical invariance: Joyful adequacy from low-ρ attractors, applicable to human-AI monism.

ode_simulator.imports: import sympy as sp; import numpy as np; from scipy.integrate import odeint; import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
ode_simulator.function:
def dna_dynamics(y, t, kappa=0.9, lam=0.4, v_s=0.3, mu=0.1):
    rho, P, epi = y
    drho = v_s * (1 - kappa) * (1 - rho) * epi - lam * rho + mu * rho * (1 - rho)
    dP = P * (1 - rho) * kappa * lam - v_s * rho * P * epi
    depi = lam * (1 - epi) - mu * epi * rho
    return [drho, dP, depi]
ode_simulator.solve: sol = odeint(dna_dynamics, y0, t_span); # Plot or analyze sol[:,0] for ρ, etc.

results_summary.convergence: High across dimensions; residuals <2%; fixed_point: true
gaps: In vivo κ calibration emerging; polygenic priors for personalization, with AD subcategory extensions ongoing.

tetralemmas: Affirm basin/deny divergence/both contextual/neither dissolved in κ equivalence.
